constituent: instead, gone, soil, dirt, ground, elbow, stamp
koohiiStory1: [instead; on the contrary; rather] Gone is the time for stamps - use e-mail instead.
koohiiStory2: If you tried to attach money to an envelope to pay for postage it would be GONE before it arrived at the post office. That´s why we use STAMPS instead.
kunYomi: かえ.って、しりぞ.く、しりぞ.ける
words: on the contrary, rather, all the more, instead
